section1.title: Return Policy
section1.content:
At scentsaver.net, we strive to offer our customers unbeatable prices.
        To maintain our competitive pricing, we do not accept returns or
        exchanges for products unless they are damaged, defective, or incorrect.
        All sales are final once the order is placed.

section2.title: Damages and Issues
section2.content:
If there is a mistake with your order and/or your order arrives damaged
        in any way, please contact us at contact@scentsaver.net within 7 days of
        receipt of your order and we will be more than happy to assist you.
section2.footnote:
Please note: scentsaver.net reserves the right to evaluate and address
        each issue at our discretion. We may decline to process claims that we
        determine to be fraudulent, abusive, or otherwise inconsistent with our
        policy.
